title: BC3-2013_cal
content:
In this section, a step- by- step procedure for the elastic analysis of a building is described for 
Sesimic Actions highlighting the key recommendations of BC3, using Ductility Class DCL. 
The example building is a multi-storey reinforced concrete structure. Two floor plans (typical and 
basement) and the elevation of the building are shown in Figures 1, 2 and 3, respectively. The 
building properties are listed in Section 2.
